question: Which financial institution is set to launch ‘Swavalamban Express’ Train to promote entrepreneurship?
option1: Small Industries Development Bank of India
option2: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
option4: Export and Import Bank of India
answer: Small Industries Development Bank of India
explanation:
The Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) said that it will launch Swavalamban Express Train on June 5 this year for budding entrepreneurs.
The Swavalamban Express will travel to 11 cities covering 7,000 km in 15 days. This is a part of its umbrella mission Swavalamban. Under this mission, youths will board the train with an idea and they shall get down with effective business plan after a series of experimental learning
